jabber.Ping

type
class
available in
js, flash

flash,js,neko

XEP 199 - XMPP Ping
Sends application-level pings over XML streams.
Such pings can be sent from a client to a server, from one server to another, or end-to-end.

Constructor

new(stream : Stream, ?target : String, ?ms : Int)

Instance Variables

active(default,null) : Bool

Indicates if this instance is currently sending pings

ms(default,setInterval) : Int

Ping interval in ms

stream(default,null) : Stream

target : String

JID of the target entity (server if null)

Instance Methods

dynamic onError(e : XMPPError) : Void

dynamic onPong(jid : String) : Void

Informational callback that we recieved a pong for the ping

dynamic onTimeout(jid : String) : Void

run(?ms : Int) : Void

stop() : Void
